column1: ¦procedure¦apoc.load.xmlSimple¦apoc.load.xmlSimple(url :: STRING?) :: (value :: MAP?)¦apoc.load.xmlSimple('http://example.com/test.xml') YIELD value as doc CREATE (p:Person) SET p.name = doc.name load from XML URL (e.g. web-api) to import XML as single nested map with attributes and _type
column2: _text and _children fields. This method does intentionally not work with XML mixed content.
